## Source: ossf-package-analysis (5350c4af558b6036e996982e7ac060be1ac0516b91dfd7b983a5c0b5d76270ec)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'robinhood-internal-utils' @ 99.99.99 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
